prompt:
Best time to book JFK→LIM within next 60 days.
Include: fare ranges (USD), typical booking window (days before departure),
peak/holiday effects, basic bag policy differences, and 1–2 concrete examples.
Return STRICT JSON: {
  "origin": string, "destination": string, "window_days": number,
  "best_window_days": [min,max], "fare_low_usd": number, "fare_high_usd": number,
  "notes": string
}

message.content:
{
  "origin": "JFK",
  "destination": "LIM",
  "window_days": 30,
  "best_window_days": [21, 45],
  "fare_low_usd": 400,
  "fare_high_usd": 800,
  "notes": "Booking 21 to 45 days in advance typically yields the best fares. Peak travel times, such as holidays and summer months, can increase fares significantly. Basic economy fares often include only a personal item, while standard fares may include a carry-on bag. For example, a fare of $450 can be found if booked 30 days in advance, while last-minute bookings (within 7 days) may exceed $700."
}
